lead_paragraph: Camila Giorgi has turned down a call-up to Italy's Fed Cup team for its World Group playoff against Spain, choosing to compete in qualifying for a tournament in Stuttgart, Germany, instead.

headline.print_headline: Giorgi Turns Down Call-Up to Italy's Fed Cup Team
headline.main: Giorgi Turns Down Call-Up to Italy's Fed Cup Team
